analysis.description:
Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/37/0x52fe31c97e5c29ea63cbcfb045e1171427bb9248.sol:
	Contract NewRich has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_chucks/37/0x52fe31c97e5c29ea63cbcfb045e1171427bb9248.sol#218)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether

Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_chucks/37/0x52fe31c97e5c29ea63cbcfb045e1171427bb9248.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.18 (/unique_chucks/37/0x52fe31c97e5c29ea63cbcfb045e1171427bb9248.sol#1): it allows old versions
Parameter '_newOwner' of Owned.transferOwnership (/unique_chucks/37/0x52fe31c97e5c29ea63cbcfb045e1171427bb9248.sol#88) is not in mixedCase
